# semvers Provider

Use `github.com/Masterminds/semver/v3` to sort semver strings.

## Example Usage

```terraform
terraform {
  required_providers {
    semvers = {
      source = "anapsix/semvers"
    }
  }
}

provider "semvers" {}
```
